rejection_reasons.issue: 100% contract file coverage missing: only 6 contracts listed while metadata claims 18 total.
rejection_reasons.required_fix: Enumerate and summarize all contract files in scope (18/18) with purpose, LOC, key variables, and external calls.

rejection_reasons.issue: Attack surface lacks full public/external function mapping and external call points per contract.
rejection_reasons.required_fix: Provide per-contract public/external function inventory and external call dependencies to satisfy attack surface identification requirement.

major: Expand attack surface to list public/external entry points and external call sites.

guidance: Scout output must include architecture, business logic, attack surface, on-chain analysis, deep-dive areas, and full contract coverage. Ensure every contract file is summarized and public-facing attack surface is cataloged.
resubmission_instructions: Address critical and major issues above, then resubmit for validation.
